SQL_STMT_U.val: select * from (select T0.DocNum as 'Invoice Number', T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', TC.PrcName as 'Consignee Name', T0.NumAtCard as 'Invoice Reference', T0.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', T0.CardCode as 'Customer Code', T0.CardName as 'Customer Name', TG.GroupCode as 'Group Code', TG.GroupName as 'Customer Group', T0.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Receipt Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Receipt Date', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Receipt', (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from OINV as T0 left join (select B.BaseEntry,B.BaseType,A.DocNum,A.DocEntry,A.ObjType,A.NumAtCard,A.DocDate,A.DocCur,A.DocTotal from ORIN as A inner join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry=B.DocEntry and A.ObjType=B.DocType and A.CANCELED='N') as TY on T0.DocEntry=TY.BaseEntry and T0.ObjType=TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment',H.DocDate,H.DocTotal,D.DocNum,D.InvoiceId,D.DocEntry,D.InvType,D.ObjType,D.SumApplied,D.PaidSum from ORCT as H inner join RCT2 as D on H.DocEntry=D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on T0.DocEntry=TZ.DocEntry and T0.ObjType=TZ.InvType left join OPRC TC on TC.PrcCode=T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode Where T0.DocStatus = 'C' union select null as 'Invoice Number', TY.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', TC.PrcName as 'Consignee Name', null as 'Invoice Reference', null as 'Invoice Date', TY.CardCode as 'Customer Code', TY.CardName as 'Customer Name', TG.GroupCode as 'Group Code', TG.GroupName as 'Customer Group', null as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Receipt Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Receipt Date', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Receipt', (TY.DocTotal-TY.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from ORIN as TY join RIN1 HH on TY.DocEntry=HH.DocEntry and HH.BaseType='-1' left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment',H.DocDate,H.DocTotal,D.DocNum,D.InvoiceId,D.DocEntry,D.InvType,D.ObjType,D.SumApplied,D.PaidSum from ORCT as H inner join RCT2 as D on H.DocEntry=D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TY.DocEntry=TZ.DocEntry and TY.ObjType=TZ.InvType left join OPRC TC on TC.PrcCode=TY.U_IDU_Kode_PT left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=TY.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode ) as ZZ where :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :4=:5 and ZZ.[Customer Code]=:6 and (ZZ.Consignee = ':7' OR ':7' is null or ':7' = '') and (ZZ.[Group Code]=:8 OR :8 is null or :8=0) order by ZZ.[Customer Code],ZZ.[Receipt Number],ZZ.[Sequence] asc

ExpSyntax.val:
IF({0,55}='',
CASE({0,51}, 'OINV','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])', 'ORIN','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[CN Number])', 'ORCT','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Receipt Number])', 'convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])'),
ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,55})&ASCIIChr(39))

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select T0.DocNum as 'Invoice Number', T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', TC.PrcName as 'Consignee Name', T0.NumAtCard as 'Invoice Reference', T0.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', T0.CardCode as 'Customer Code', T0.CardName as 'Customer Name', TG.GroupCode as 'Group Code', TG.GroupName as 'Customer Group', T0.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Receipt Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Receipt Date', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Receipt', (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due', 1 AS 'Num' from OINV as T0 left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment',H.DocDate,H.DocTotal,D.DocNum,D.InvoiceId,D.DocEntry,D.InvType,D.ObjType,D.SumApplied,D.PaidSum from ORCT as H inner join RCT2 as D on H.DocEntry=D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on T0.DocEntry=TZ.DocEntry and T0.ObjType=TZ.InvType left join OPRC TC on TC.PrcCode=T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode Where T0.DocStatus = 'C' and :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :4=:5 and T0.CardCode=:6 and (T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':7' OR ':7' is null or ':7' = '') and (TG.GroupCode=:8 OR :8 is null or :8=0) UNION -- SUBTOTAL select NULL as 'Invoice Number', 'SUBTOTAL' AS 'Consignee', 'SUBTOTAL' as 'Consignee Name', NULL as 'Invoice Reference', NULL as 'Invoice Date', T0.CardCode as 'Customer Code', T0.CardName as 'Customer Name', NULL as 'Group Code', NULL as 'Customer Group', NULL as 'Total Invoice', NULL as 'Receipt Number', NULL as 'Sequence', NULL as 'Receipt Date', SUM(TZ.PaidSum) as 'Total Receipt', NULL as 'Balance Due', 1 as 'Num' from OINV as T0 left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment',H.DocDate,H.DocTotal,D.DocNum,D.InvoiceId,D.DocEntry,D.InvType,D.ObjType,D.SumApplied,D.PaidSum from ORCT as H inner join RCT2 as D on H.DocEntry=D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on T0.DocEntry=TZ.DocEntry and T0.ObjType=TZ.InvType left join OPRC TC on TC.PrcCode=T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode Where T0.DocStatus = 'C' and :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :4=:5 and T0.CardCode=:6 and (T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':7' OR ':7' is null or ':7' = '') and (TG.GroupCode=:8 OR :8 is null or :8=0) Group By T0.CardCode, T0.CardName
UNION -- TOTAL select NULL as 'Invoice Number', 'TOTAL' AS 'Consignee', 'TOTAL' as 'Consignee Name', NULL as 'Invoice Reference', NULL as 'Invoice Date', NULL as 'Customer Code', NULL as 'Customer Name', NULL as 'Group Code', NULL as 'Customer Group', NULL as 'Total Invoice', NULL as 'Receipt Number', NULL as 'Sequence', NULL as 'Receipt Date', SUM(TZ.PaidSum) as 'Total Receipt', NULL as 'Balance Due', 2 as 'Num' from OINV as T0 left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment',H.DocDate,H.DocTotal,D.DocNum,D.InvoiceId,D.DocEntry,D.InvType,D.ObjType,D.SumApplied,D.PaidSum from ORCT as H inner join RCT2 as D on H.DocEntry=D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on T0.DocEntry=TZ.DocEntry and T0.ObjType=TZ.InvType left join OPRC TC on TC.PrcCode=T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode Where T0.DocStatus = 'C' and :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :4=:5 and T0.CardCode=:6 and (T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':7' OR ':7' is null or ':7' = '') and (TG.GroupCode=:8 OR :8 is null or :8=0) order by Num,T0.CardCode,T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT,TZ.Number_Payment,TZ.InvoiceId asc

select * from (select T0.DocNum as 'Invoice Number', T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', TC.PrcName as 'Consignee Name', T0.NumAtCard as 'Invoice Reference', T0.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', T0.CardCode as 'Customer Code', T0.CardName as 'Customer Name', TG.GroupCode as 'Group Code', TG.GroupName as 'Customer Group', T0.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Receipt Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Receipt Date', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Receipt', (T0.DocTotal - T0.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from OINV as T0 left join (select B.BaseEntry,B.BaseType,A.DocNum,A.DocEntry,A.ObjType,A.NumAtCard,A.DocDate,A.DocCur,A.DocTotal from ORIN as A inner join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry=B.DocEntry and A.ObjType=B.DocType and A.CANCELED='N') as TY on T0.DocEntry=TY.BaseEntry and T0.ObjType=TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment',H.DocDate,H.DocTotal,D.DocNum,D.InvoiceId,D.DocEntry,D.InvType,D.ObjType,D.SumApplied,D.PaidSum from ORCT as H inner join RCT2 as D on H.DocEntry=D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on T0.DocEntry=TZ.DocEntry and T0.ObjType=TZ.InvType left join OPRC TC on TC.PrcCode=T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=T0.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode Where T0.DocStatus = 'C' union select null as 'Invoice Number', TY.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', TC.PrcName as 'Consignee Name', null as 'Invoice Reference', null as 'Invoice Date', TY.CardCode as 'Customer Code', TY.CardName as 'Customer Name', TG.GroupCode as 'Group Code', TG.GroupName as 'Customer Group', null as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', TZ.Number_Payment as 'Receipt Number', TZ.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', TZ.DocDate as 'Receipt Date', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Receipt', (TY.DocTotal-TY.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from ORIN as TY join RIN1 HH on TY.DocEntry=HH.DocEntry and HH.BaseType='-1' left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment',H.DocDate,H.DocTotal,D.DocNum,D.InvoiceId,D.DocEntry,D.InvType,D.ObjType,D.SumApplied,D.PaidSum from ORCT as H inner join RCT2 as D on H.DocEntry=D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TY.DocEntry=TZ.DocEntry and TY.ObjType=TZ.InvType left join OPRC TC on TC.PrcCode=TY.U_IDU_Kode_PT left join OCRD TD on TD.CardCode=TY.CardCode left join OCRG TG on TG.GroupCode=TD.GroupCode ) as ZZ where :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :4=:5 and ZZ.[Customer Code]=:6 and (ZZ.Consignee = ':7' OR ':7' is null or ':7' = '') and (ZZ.[Group Code]=:8 OR :8 is null or :8=0) order by ZZ.[Customer Code],ZZ.[Receipt Number],ZZ.[Sequence] asc

ExpSyntax.val:
IF({0,55}='',
CASE({0,51}, 'OINV','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])', 'ORIN','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[CN Number])', 'ORCT','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Receipt Number])', 'convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])'),
ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,55})&ASCIIChr(39))

DisplayList.valUnicode: A/R Invoice,Incoming Payment, A/R Credit Note
A/R Invoice,Incoming Payment, A/R Credit Note
